verses.name: Mark 10:36
verses.text: And he said unto them, What would ye that I should do for you?

verses.name: Mark 10:37
verses.text: They said unto him, Grant unto us that we may sit, one on thy right hand, and the other on thy left hand, in thy glory.

verses.name: Mark 10:38
verses.text: But Jesus said unto them, Ye know not what ye ask: can ye drink of the cup that I drink of? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with?
